verses.verse: Likewise this is the law<WH8451> of the trespass offering<WH817>: it is most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.

In the place<WH4725> where they kill<WH7819> the burnt offering<WH5930> shall they kill<WH7819> the trespass offering<WH817>: and the blood<WH1818> there shall he sprinkle<WH2236> round about<WH5439> upon the altar<WH4196>.
And he shall offer<WH7126> of it all the fat<WH2459> there the rump<WH451>, and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the innards<WH7130>,

And the two<WH8147> kidneys<WH3629>, and the fat<WH2459> that is on them<WH3689>, which is by the flanks, and the membrane<WH3508> that is above the liver<WH3516>, with the kidneys<WH3629>, it shall he take away<WH5493>:
And the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them upon the altar<WH4196> for an offering made by fire<WH801> to the Lord<WH3068>: it is a trespass offering<WH817>.
Every male<WH2145> among the priests<WH3548> shall eat<WH398> there it shall be eaten<WH398> in the holy<WH6918> place<WH4725>: it is most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.
As the sin offering<WH2403> is<WH817>, so is the trespass offering: there is one<WH259> law<WH8451> for them<WH3548>: the priest that makes atonement with it shall have it<WH3722>.

And the priest<WH3548> that offers<WH7126> any man<WH376>'s burnt offering<WH5930>, even the priest<WH3548> shall have to himself the skin<WH5785> of the burnt offering<WH5930> which he has offered<WH7126>.

And all the food offering<WH4503> that is baked<WH644> in the oven<WH8574>, and all that is dressed<WH6213> in the fryingpan<WH4802>, and in the pan<WH4227>, shall be the priest<WH3548>'s that offers it<WH7126>.
And every food offering<WH4503>, mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, and dry<WH2720>, shall all the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> have<WH376>, one as much as another<WH251>.
And this is the law<WH8451> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002>, which he shall offer<WH7126> to the Lord<WH3068>.

If he offer<WH7126> it for a thanksgiving<WH8426>, then he shall offer<WH7126> with the sacrifice<WH2077> of thanksgiving<WH8426> unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> anointed<WH4886> with oil<WH8081>, and cakes<WH2471> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, of fine flour<WH5560>, fried<WH7246>.
Besides the cakes<WH2471>, he shall offer<WH7126> for his offering<WH7133> leavened<WH2557> bread<WH3899> with the sacrifice<WH2077> of thanksgiving<WH8426> of his peace offerings<WH8002>.

And of it he shall offer<WH7126> one<WH259> out of the whole oblation<WH7133> for an heave offering<WH8641> to the Lord<WH3068>, and it shall be the priest<WH3548>'s that sprinkles<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> of the peace offerings<WH8002>.

And the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace offerings<WH8002> for thanksgiving<WH8426> shall be eaten<WH398> the same day<WH3117> that it is offered<WH7133>; he shall not leave<WH3240> any of it until the morning<WH1242>.

But if the sacrifice<WH2077> of his offering<WH7133> be a vow<WH5088>, or a voluntary offering<WH5071>, it shall be eaten<WH398> the same day<WH3117> that he offers<WH7126> his sacrifice<WH2077>: and on the next day<WH4283> also the remainder<WH3498> of it shall be eaten<WH398>:
But the remainder<WH3498> of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> shall be burnt<WH8313> with fire<WH784>.

And if any of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace offerings<WH8002> be eaten<WH398> at all<WH398> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117>, it shall not be accepted<WH7521>, neither shall it be imputed<WH2803> to him that offers<WH7126> it<WH6292>: it shall be an abomination, and the soul<WH5315> that eat<WH398> of it shall carry<WH5375> his iniquity<WH5771>.

And the flesh<WH1320> that touches<WH5060> any unclean<WH2931> thing shall not be eaten<WH398>; it shall be burnt<WH8313> with fire<WH784>: and as for the flesh<WH1320>, all that be clean<WH2889> shall eat there<WH398>.

But the soul<WH5315> that eat<WH398> of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002>, that pertain to the Lord<WH3068>, having his uncleanness<WH2932> upon him<WH5315>, even that soul shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.

Moreover the soul<WH5315> that shall touch<WH5060> any unclean<WH2932> thing<WH2932>, as the uncleanness of man<WH120>, or any unclean<WH2931> animal<WH929>, or any abominable<WH8263> unclean<WH2931> thing<WH398>, and eat of the flesh<WH1320> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002>, which pertain to the Lord<WH3068>, even that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, You shall eat<WH398> no manner of fat<WH2459>, of ox<WH7794>, or of sheep<WH3775>, or of goat<WH5795>.

And the fat<WH2459> of the animal that dies of itself<WH5038>, and the fat<WH2459> of that which is torn with animals<WH2966>, may be used<WH6213> in any other use<WH4399>: but you shall in no wise<WH398> eat of it<WH398>.

For whoever eat<WH398> the fat<WH2459> of the animal<WH929>, of which men offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> to the Lord<WH3068>, even the soul<WH5315> that eat<WH398> it shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.
Moreover you shall eat<WH398> no manner of blood<WH1818>, whether it be of bird<WH5775> or of animal<WH929>, in any of your dwellings<WH4186>.
Whatever soul<WH5315> it be that eat<WH398> any manner<WH3605> of blood<WH1818>, even that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, He that offers<WH7126> the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace offerings<WH8002> to the Lord<WH3068> shall bring<WH935> his oblation<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of his peace offerings<WH8002>.

His own hands<WH3027> shall bring<WH935> the offerings<WH801> of the Lord<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>, the fat<WH2459> with the breast<WH2373>, it shall he bring<WH935>, that the breast<WH2373> may be waved<WH5130> for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.
And the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> upon the altar<WH4196>: but the breast<WH2373> shall be Aaron<WH175>'s and his sons<WH1121>'.
And the right<WH3225> shoulder<WH7785> shall you give<WH5414> to the priest<WH3548> for an heave offering<WH8641> of the sacrifices<WH2077> of your peace offerings<WH8002>.

He among the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>, that offers<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> of the peace offerings<WH8002>, and the fat<WH2459>, shall have the right<WH3225> shoulder<WH7785> for his part<WH4490>.

For the wave<WH8573> breast<WH2373> and the heave<WH8641> shoulder<WH7785> have I taken<WH3947> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from off the sacrifices<WH2077> of their peace offerings<WH8002>, and have given<WH5414> them to Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> and to his sons<WH1121> by a statute<WH2706> for ever<WH5769> from among the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

This is the portion of the anointing<WH4888> of Aaron<WH175>, and of the anointing<WH4888> of his sons<WH1121>, out of the offerings<WH801> of the Lord<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>, in the day<WH3117> when he presented<WH7126> them to minister to the Lord<WH3068> in the priest<WH3547>'s office;

Which the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> to be given<WH5414> them of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, in the day<WH3117> that he anointed<WH4886> them<WH2708>, by a statute for ever<WH5769> throughout their generations<WH1755>.

This is the law<WH8451> of the burnt offering<WH5930>, of the food offering<WH4503>, and of the sin offering<WH2403>, and of the trespass offering<WH817>, and of the consecrations<WH4394>, and of the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace offerings<WH8002>;

Which the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> in mountain<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514>, in the day<WH3117> that he commanded<WH6680> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to offer<WH7126> their oblations<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068>, in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai<WH5514>.
